quote: A great relationship ... breaches the barriers of a lofty solitude, subdues its strict law, and throws a bridge from self-being to self-being across the abyss of dread of the universe.
quote_letters: A GREAT RELATIONSHIP  BREACHES THE BARRIERS OF A LOFTY SOLITUDE SUBDUES ITS STRICT LAW AND THROWS A BRIDGE FROM SELF-BEING TO SELF-BEING ACROSS THE ABYSS OF DREAD OF THE UNIVERSE
